item.title: Meet the man behind Pleco, the revolutionary Chinese language learning app that’s older than the iPhone
item.description: Learning Chinese is not for the faint of heart. Not only does the non-native Mandarin speaker have to master the language’s infamous tones, he or she must memorize thousands of (practically speaking) non-phonetic characters, get acquainted with a range of accents, and grapple with a deceptively simple grammar system.
